text:
Tried running the following command using Ant 1.7:

<scp
file="mqm@MQ-GATEWAY-INT.sis.tv:/var/mqm/qmgrs/LIGWGWAY1/@ipcc/AMQCLCHL.TAB"
localTodir="client_conn_tables" password="blah" trust="yes"/>

And get the following:
no remote path in
mqm@MQ-GATEWAY-INT.sis.tv:/var/mqm/qmgrs/LIGWGWAY1/@ipcc/AMQCLCHL.TAB

This used to work in Ant 1.6.5!!

It looks like some over-zealous checks are being made on the remote path which
get confused by the second '@' symbol in the remote path. It works fine for
paths without this second symbol.

This has been broken by the solution in bugrep 38082
 (allow @ in password)
